00067 NonGradient::NonGradient(ObjectiveFunction* of) 
00068   : VertexMover(of),
00069     PatchSetUser(true),
00070     projectGradient(false),
00071     mDimension(0),
00072     mThreshold(0.0),
00073     mTolerance(0.0),
00074     mMaxNumEval(0),
00075     mNonGradDebug(0),
00076     mUseExactPenaltyFunction(true),
00077     mScaleDiameter(0.1)
00078 {
00079   set_debugging_level(2);
00080   //set the default inner termination criterion
00081   TerminationCriterion* default_crit=get_inner_termination_criterion();
00082   if(default_crit==NULL){
00083     return;
00084   }
00085   else{
00086     default_crit->add_iteration_limit( 5 );
00087   }
00088 }

00090 NonGradient::NonGradient(ObjectiveFunction* of, MsqError &err) 
00091   : VertexMover(of),
00092     PatchSetUser(true),
00093     projectGradient(false),
00094     mDimension(0),
00095     mThreshold(0.0),
00096     mTolerance(0.0),
00097     mMaxNumEval(0),
00098     mNonGradDebug(0),
00099     mUseExactPenaltyFunction(true),
00100     mScaleDiameter(0.1)
00101 {
00102   set_debugging_level(2);
00103   //set the default inner termination criterion
00104   TerminationCriterion* default_crit=get_inner_termination_criterion();
00105   if(default_crit==NULL){
00106     MSQ_SETERR(err)("QualityImprover did not create a default inner "
00107                     "termination criterion.", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00108     return;
00109   }
00110   else{
00111     default_crit->add_iteration_limit( 5 );
00112     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00113   }
00114 }

00116 bool
00117 NonGradient::testRowSum( int numRow, int numCol, double* matrix, double* oldRowSum)
00118 {
00119   bool same = true;
00120   std::vector<double> rowSum(numRow,0.);
00121   double maxVal = 0.;
00122   for (int col=0;col<numCol;col++)    
00123   {
00124     for (int row=0;row<numRow;row++)
00125     {
00126       rowSum[row] += matrix[row+col*numRow];
00127       if( fabs( matrix[row+col*numRow] ) > maxVal )
00128       {
00129          maxVal = fabs( matrix[row+col*numRow] );
00130       }
00131     }
00132   }
00133   double machEps = 1.e-14 * static_cast<double>(numRow); // better to use system parameters
00134   double upperBound = machEps * maxVal + 1.e-15;
00135   for (int row=0;row<numRow;row++)
00136   {
00137     if( fabs( rowSum[row] -  oldRowSum[row]) >  upperBound ) 
00138     { 
00139          same = false;
00140          if( mNonGradDebug >= 2 )
00141          {
00142            std::cout << " Warning: NonGradient Row Sum " << row << " Test: value " << rowSum[row] << " Discrepancy " <<  rowSum[row] -  oldRowSum[row] << " maxVal " << maxVal << " numRow " << numRow << " numCol " << numCol <<std::endl;
00143          }
00144          MSQ_PRINT(2)("NonGradient Row Sum [%d] Test failure: value %22.15e  difference %22.15e \n", row, rowSum[row], rowSum[row] -  oldRowSum[row]); 
00145     }
00146   }
00147   return(same);
00148 }
00149 
00150 void 
00151 NonGradient::getRowSum( int numRow, int numCol, std::vector<double>& matrix, std::vector<double>& rowSum)
00152 {
00153   for (int row=0;row<numRow;row++)
00154   {
00155       rowSum[row] = 0.;
00156   }
00157   for (int col=0;col<numCol;col++)    
00158   {
00159     for (int row=0;row<numRow;row++)
00160     {
00161       rowSum[row] += matrix[row+col*numRow];
00162     }
00163   }
00164 }
00165 
00166 double 
00167 NonGradient::evaluate( double *point,  PatchData &pd, MsqError &err )
00168 {
00169   if( pd.num_free_vertices() > 1 )
00170   {
00171     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Only one free vertex per patch implemented", MsqError::NOT_IMPLEMENTED);
00172   }
00173   const size_t vertexIndex = 0; 
00174   Vector3D originalVec = pd.vertex_by_index(vertexIndex);
00175   Vector3D pointVec;
00176   for( int index = 0; index<3; index++)
00177   {
00178     pointVec[index] = point[index];
00179   }
00180   pd.set_vertex_coordinates( pointVec, vertexIndex, err ); 
00181   pd.snap_vertex_to_domain( vertexIndex, err );  
00182 
00183   OFEvaluator& obj_func = get_objective_function_evaluator();
00184   TerminationCriterion* term_crit=get_inner_termination_criterion();
00185 
00186   double value;
00187   bool feasible = obj_func.evaluate( pd, value, err ); // MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00188   term_crit->accumulate_inner( pd, value, 0, err );  //MSQ_CHKERR(err);
00189   if (err.error_code() == err.BARRIER_VIOLATED)
00190     err.clear();   // barrier violation not an error here
00191   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00192   pd.set_vertex_coordinates( originalVec, vertexIndex, err ); 
00193   if( !feasible && mUseExactPenaltyFunction )  
00194   { // "value" undefined btw
00195     double ensureFiniteRtol= .25;
00196     value = DBL_MAX * ensureFiniteRtol;
00197     //std::cout << " Infeasible patch: " << value << std::endl; printPatch( pd, err );
00198   }
00199   return value;
00200 }
00201 
00202 // Extrapolate by a factor of fac through the face of the simplex
00203 // opposite the high point to a new point.  If the new point is 
00204 // better, swap it with the high point.
00205 double
00206 NonGradient::amotry( std::vector<double>& simplex, 
00207                  std::vector<double>& height,
00208                  double psum[], int ihi, double fac, PatchData &pd, MsqError &err)
00209 {
00210   int numRow = getDimension();
00211   int numCol = numRow + 1;
00212   std::vector<double> ptry(numRow); // does this make sense?
00213   double fac1=(1.0-fac)/static_cast<double>(numRow);
00214   double fac2=fac1-fac;
00215   for (int row=0;row<numRow;row++)
00216   {
00217     ptry[row]=psum[row]*fac1-simplex[row+ihi*numRow]*fac2;
00218   }
00219   if( mNonGradDebug >= 3 ) 
00220   {      
00221     std::cout << "Try ";
00222   }      
00223   MSQ_PRINT(3)("Try");
00224   double ytry = evaluate(&ptry[0], pd, err); // value at trial point
00225   if( mNonGradDebug >= 3 ) 
00226   {      
00227     std::cout << ytry << std::endl;
00228   }      
00229   MSQ_PRINT(3)("yTry");
00230   if (ytry < height[ihi]) // better than highest (worst)
00231   {
00232     height[ihi]=ytry;     // swap ihi and ytry
00233     for (int row=0;row<numRow;row++)
00234     {
00235       psum[row] += (ptry[row]-simplex[row+ihi*numRow]);
00236       simplex[row+ihi*numRow]=ptry[row];
00237     }
00238   }
00239   return ytry;
00240 }

00242 void NonGradient::printPatch(const PatchData &pd, MsqError &err)
00243 {
00244   if( mNonGradDebug==0 )
00245   {
00246     return;
00247   }
00248   const size_t numNode = pd.num_nodes();   //27,  27 what?
00249   MSQ_PRINT(3)("Number of Vertices: %d\n",(int)pd.num_nodes());
00250   const size_t numVert = pd.num_free_vertices(); // 1
00251   MSQ_PRINT(3)("Num Free = %d\n",(int)pd.num_free_vertices());
00252   const size_t numSlaveVert = pd.num_slave_vertices(); //0
00253   const size_t numCoin = pd.num_corners(); // 64
00254   const MsqVertex* coord = pd.get_vertex_array(err);
00255   MSQ_PRINT(3)("Number of Vertices: %d\n",(int)pd.num_nodes());
00256 
00257   std::cout << "Patch " << numNode << "  " << numVert << "  " << numSlaveVert << "  " << numCoin << std::endl;
00258   MSQ_PRINT(3)("");
00259   std::cout << "Coordinate ";
00260   std::cout << "         " << std::endl;
00261   for( size_t index = 0; index < numVert; index++ )
00262   {
00263     std::cout << coord[index][0] << "  " << coord[index][1] << "  " << coord[index][2] << std::endl;
00264   }
00265   //const size_t numElt = pd.num_elements();
00266   if( mNonGradDebug >= 3 ) 
00267   {      
00268          std::cout << "Number of Elements: " << pd.num_elements() << std::endl;
00269   }      
00270   MSQ_PRINT(3)("Number of Elements: %d\n",(int)pd.num_elements());
00271 }

00273 void
00274 NonGradient::printSimplex( std::vector<double>& simplex , std::vector<double>& height )
00275 {
00276   int numRow = getDimension();
00277   int numCol = numRow + 1;
00278   for (int col=0;col<numCol;col++)    
00279   {
00280     //std::cout << "simplex[ " << col << "]= " ;
00281     for (int row=0;row<numRow;row++)
00282     {
00283       std::cout << simplex[row+col*numRow] << " "; 
00284     }
00285     //std::cout << "           "  << height[col] << std::endl;
00286   }
00287   for (int col=0;col<numCol;col++)    
00288   {
00289     std::cout << height[col] << " ";
00290   }
00291   std::cout << std::endl;
00292 }
00293 
00294 int NonGradient::getPatchDimension(const PatchData &pd, MsqError &err)
00295 {
00296   const size_t numElt = pd.num_elements();
00297   unsigned edimMax = 0;  // in case numElt == 0
00298   for( size_t elementId = 0; elementId < numElt; elementId++)
00299   {
00300     const MsqMeshEntity& element = pd.element_by_index( elementId );
00301     EntityTopology type = element.get_element_type();
00302     unsigned edim = TopologyInfo::dimension( type );
00303     if( elementId == 0 ) 
00304     {
00305       edimMax = edim;
00306     } 
00307     else
00308     { 
00309       if(edimMax != edim)
00310       {
00311         MSQ_SETERR(err)("A patch has elements of different dimensions", MsqError::INVALID_MESH);
00312         std::cout << "A patch has elements of different dimensions" << edimMax << "  "  << edim << std::endl;
00313         if(edimMax < edim)
00314         {
00315           edimMax = edim;
00316         }
00317       }
00318     }
00319   }
00320   return( edimMax );
00321 }

00325 }
00326 
00327 void NonGradient::initialize_mesh_iteration(PatchData &pd, MsqError &err)
00328 {
00329   int elementDimension = getPatchDimension( pd, err );  // to do: react to error
00330   int dimension = elementDimension * pd.num_free_vertices();
00331   //printPatch( pd, err );
00332   setDimension(dimension);
00333   int maxNumEval = 100*dimension;  // 1. Make this a user parameter
00334   setMaxNumEval(maxNumEval);
00335   double threshold = 1.e-10; // avoid division by zero
00336   setThreshold(threshold);
00337   double minEdgeLen = 0.0;
00338   double maxEdgeLen = 0.0;
00339 //  double ftol = 0.;
00340   if( dimension > 0 )
00341   {
00342     pd.get_minmax_edge_length( minEdgeLen, maxEdgeLen );
00343     //ftol = minEdgeLen * 1.e-4; // Turn off Amoeba convergence criterion
00344     if( mNonGradDebug >= 1 ) 
00345     {      
00346          std::cout << "minimum edge length " << minEdgeLen << " maximum edge length " << maxEdgeLen << std::endl;
00347     }      
00348     MSQ_PRINT(3)("minimum edge length %e    maximum edge length %e\n", minEdgeLen,  maxEdgeLen);
00349   }
00350 //  setTolerance(ftol);
00351   int numRow = dimension;
00352   int numCol = numRow+1;  
00353   if( numRow*numCol <= simplex.max_size() )
00354   { 
00355     simplex.assign(numRow*numCol, 0.);  // guard against previous simplex value
00356     double scale = minEdgeLen * mScaleDiameter;; 
00357     const MsqVertex* coord = pd.get_vertex_array(err);
00358     if( pd.num_free_vertices() > 1 )
00359     {
00360       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Only one free vertex per patch implemented", MsqError::NOT_IMPLEMENTED);
00361     }
00362     size_t index = 0;
00363     for( int col = 0; col < numCol; col++ )
00364     {
00365       for (int row=0;row<numRow;row++)
00366       {
00367         simplex[ row + col*numRow ] = coord[index][row];
00368         if( row == col-1 )
00369         {
00370           simplex[ row + col*numRow ] += scale/ static_cast<double>(numCol);
00371         }
00372       }
00373     }
00374   }
00375   else
00376   {
00377     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Use patch with fewer free vertices", MsqError::OUT_OF_MEMORY);
00378     if( mNonGradDebug >= 1 ) 
00379     {      
00380       std::cout << "ERROR: Too many free vertices in patch" << std::endl;
00381     }      
00382     //MSQ_PRINT(1)("ERROR: Too many free vertices in patch\n");
00383   }
00384 }
00385 
00386 void NonGradient::optimize_vertex_positions(PatchData &pd, 
00387                                             MsqError &err)
00388 {
00389   MSQ_FUNCTION_TIMER( "NonGradient::optimize_vertex_positions" );
00390   int numRow = getDimension();
00391   int numCol = numRow+1;  
00392   std::vector<double> height(numCol); 
00393 
00394   for(int col = 0; col < numCol; col++)
00395   {
00396     height[col] =  evaluate(&simplex[col*numRow], pd, err);//  eval patch stuff
00397   }
00398   if(mNonGradDebug > 0)
00399   {
00400     printSimplex( simplex, height );
00401   }
00402 
00403   // standardization
00404   TerminationCriterion* term_crit=get_inner_termination_criterion();
00405   int maxNumEval = getMaxNumEval();
00406   double threshold = getThreshold();
00407 //  double ftol = getTolerance();
00408   int ilo = 0;  //height[ilo]<=...
00409   int inhi = 0; //...<=height[inhi]<=
00410   int ihi = 0;  //<=height[ihi] 
00411 //  double rtol = 2.*ftol;
00412   double ysave;
00413   double ytry;
00414   bool afterEvaluation = false;
00415   std::vector<double> rowSum(numRow);
00416   getRowSum( numRow, numCol, simplex, rowSum);
00417   while( !( term_crit->terminate() ) )
00418   {
00419 
00420     if(mNonGradDebug > 0)
00421     {
00422       printSimplex( simplex, height );
00423     }
00424     //std::cout << "rtol " << rtol << " ftol " << ftol << " MesquiteIter " << term_crit->get_iteration_count() << " Done " << term_crit->terminate() << std::endl;
00425 
00426     if( afterEvaluation )   
00427     {
00428       // reflect highPt through opposite face
00429       // height[0] may vanish
00430 /*
00431       if( !testRowSum( numRow, numCol, &simplex[0], &rowSum[0]) )
00432       {
00433         // Before uncommenting here and ... 
00434         //MSQ_SETERR(err)("Internal check sum test A failed", MsqError::INTERNAL_ERROR);
00435         //MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00436       }
00437 */
00438       ytry=amotry(simplex,height,&rowSum[0],ihi,-1.0, pd, err);
00439 /*
00440       if( !testRowSum( numRow, numCol, &simplex[0], &rowSum[0]) )
00441       {
00442          // ... here, determine a maxVal majorizing the previous as well as the current simplex.
00443          //MSQ_SETERR(err)("Internal check sum test B failed", MsqError::INTERNAL_ERROR);
00444          //MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00445       }   
00446 */
00447   
00448 /*
00449       if( height[0] == 0.)
00450       {
00451          MSQ_SETERR(err)("(B) Zero objective function value", MsqError::INTERNAL_ERROR);
00452          exit(-1);
00453       }
00454 */
00455       if (ytry <= height[ilo])   
00456       {
00457         ytry=amotry(simplex,height,&rowSum[0],ihi,-2.0,pd,err);
00458         if( mNonGradDebug >= 3 ) 
00459         {      
00460          std::cout << "Reflect and Expand from highPt " << ytry << std::endl;
00461         }      
00462         //MSQ_PRINT(3)("Reflect and Expand from highPt : %e\n",ytry);
00463       }
00464       else 
00465       {
00466         if (ytry >= height[inhi]) 
00467         {
00468           ysave=height[ihi]; // Contract along highPt
00469           ytry=amotry(simplex,height,&rowSum[0],ihi,0.5,pd,err);
00470           if (ytry >= ysave)
00471           { // contract all directions toward lowPt
00472             for (int col=0;col<numCol;col++)
00473             {
00474               if (col != ilo)
00475               {
00476                 for (int row=0;row<numRow;row++)
00477                 {
00478                   rowSum[row]=0.5*(simplex[row+col*numRow]+simplex[row+ilo*numRow]);
00479                   simplex[row+col*numRow]=rowSum[row];
00480                 }
00481                 height[col] = evaluate(&rowSum[0], pd, err); 
00482                 if( mNonGradDebug >= 3 ) 
00483                 {      
00484                   std::cout << "Contract all directions toward lowPt value( " << col << " ) = " << height[col] << " ilo = " << ilo << std::endl;
00485                 }      
00486                 //MSQ_PRINT(3)("Contract all directions toward lowPt value( %d ) = %e    ilo = %d\n", col, height[col], ilo);
00487               }
00488             }
00489           }
00490         }   
00491       } // ytri > h(ilo) 
00492     } // after evaluation
00493     ilo=1; // conditional operator or inline if 
00494     ihi = height[0] > height[1] ? (inhi=1,0) : (inhi=0,1);
00495     for (int col=0;col<numCol;col++)
00496     {
00497       if (height[col] <= height[ilo])
00498       {
00499         ilo=col;  // ilo := argmin height
00500       }
00501       if (height[col] > height[ihi])
00502       {
00503         inhi=ihi;
00504         ihi=col;
00505       } 
00506       else  // height[ihi] >= height[col]
00507         if (col != ihi && height[col] > height[inhi] ) inhi=col;
00508     }
00509 //    rtol=2.0*fabs( height[ihi]-height[ilo] )/
00510 //         ( fabs(height[ihi])+fabs(height[ilo])+threshold );
00511     afterEvaluation = true;
00512   } //  while not converged 
00513 
00514   // Always set to current best mesh.
00515   { 
00516     if( ilo != 0 )
00517     {
00518       double yTemp = height[0];
00519       height[0] = height[ilo]; // height dimension numCol
00520       height[ilo] = yTemp;
00521       for (int row=1;row<numRow;row++)
00522       { 
00523           yTemp = simplex[row];
00524           simplex[row] = simplex[row+ilo*numRow];
00525           simplex[row+ilo*numRow] = yTemp;
00526       }
00527     }
00528   }
00529   if( pd.num_free_vertices() > 1 )
00530   {
00531     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Only one free vertex per patch implemented", MsqError::NOT_IMPLEMENTED);
00532   }
00533 
00534   Vector3D newPoint( &simplex[0] ); 
00535   size_t vertexIndex = 0; // fix c.f. freeVertexIndex
00536   pd.set_vertex_coordinates( newPoint, vertexIndex, err ); 
00537   pd.snap_vertex_to_domain( vertexIndex, err );
00538   if( term_crit->terminate() )
00539   {
00540     if( mNonGradDebug >= 1 ) 
00541     {      
00542          std::cout << "Optimization Termination OptStatus: Max Iter Exceeded" << std::endl;
00543     }      
00544     //MSQ_PRINT(1)("Optimization Termination OptStatus: Max Iter Exceeded\n"); 
00545   }
00546 }
00547 
00548 void NonGradient::terminate_mesh_iteration(PatchData &/*pd*/, MsqError &/*err*/)
00549 {
00550   if( mNonGradDebug >= 2 )
00551   {
00552     std::cout << "- Executing NonGradient::iteration_complete()" << std::endl;
00553   }
00554   //MSQ_PRINT(2)("\n - Executing NonGradient::iteration_complete() \n");
00555 }
00556   
00557 void NonGradient::cleanup()
00558 {
00559   if( mNonGradDebug >= 2 )
00560   {
00561     std::cout << " - Executing NonGradient::iteration_end()" << std::endl;
00562   }
00563   //MSQ_PRINT(2)("\n - Executing NonGradient::iteration_end() \n");
00564 }
